name: Countdown to Cataclysm
description:
A fast-paced, danger-filled, science fiction shooter following an alien scientist in The Galactic Ministry of Time as she attempts to save her friends and find her abducted husband. You are equipped with a powerful time-manipulation device known as a chronometer. With such power, you can summon allies from the past!

How does a viking sound? Or even a World War 2  pigeon?

DIVE INTO QUIRKY SURREALISTIC ART

MANIPULATE THE TIME WITH YOUR CHRONOMETER

SUMMON VARIOUS ALLIES FROM HISTORY

PUT AN END TO THE IMPENDING DOOM

BE RECKLESS, QUICK AND STRATEGIC

Movement - W A S D

Time-Leap - SPACE

Bio-Recovery - Q

Stasis Blast - F

Open/Close Portal - Shift/Ctrl

QA gun - Left Mouse Click

Time-Blast - Right Mouse Click

Blueberry Studio

Lead Artist - Tom Wiltshire

Lead Programmer - Abhishek Acharya

Lead Designer - Sam Powis

Producer - Tanya Duplenko
